content:
Puthranilettuparanyaajnyakall niravetti
Vishvaasam kaatthor-mrthar nin varavingkal
Svargavumazhivatta-jeevanumaarjikkum
Haale........Uhaale......Avaraanandikkum

Daivasuthaagamanam-minnal pinaroppam
Pillarum kallarakall-mrthigatharezhunnelkkum
Punaruththhaanakanaam-kartthaavine vaazhtthi
Haale.......Haale......Sthuthigeetham paadum.
